name: Lash Extension Lengthening and Defining Mascara
about: What it is:A tubing mascara that builds the appearance of striking length and extreme definition with lash benefits..Formulation Type:Volumizing, Curling, Lengthening.Benefits:Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Biotin: Helps prevent hair loss by supporting the structure of eyelashes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The buildable formula creates ultra-long-wearing, striking length and extreme definition for a lash extensions effect. Infused with biotin, shea butter, and castor seed oil, it provides nourishment for your lashes. Its 1KTech-molded brush has QuickApply bristles for effortless application.
ingredients: -Biotin: Helps prevent hair loss by supporting the structure of eyelashes..-Castor Seed Oil: Moisturizes eyelashes by creating a barrier that prevents water loss..-Shea Butter: Nourishes eyelashes while adding creaminess to the formula...Water/Aqua, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, PVP, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Laureth-21, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Biotin, May Contain/Peut Contenir(+/-): Iron Oxides CI 77499.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.To apply:.-Use on clean, dry lashes..-Start at the base of your lashes and move upward to the tips..-Wiggle the wand slightly from side to side while applying..-Keep applying until you have achieved your desired lift, definition, length, and volume..-Clean the tube opening of any residual mascara to ensure that the cap closes tightly...To remove:.-Water alone (sweat or tears), gentle pressure alone (rubbing your eyes or sleeping in your mascara), and makeup removers cannot remove the tiny mascara tubes..-Only the combination of water and gentle pressure (from your fingertips, a cotton round, or your showerhead) will slide the tiny tubes easily off your lashes..-Keep applying lots of water until the tubes begin to slide off effortlessly. Do not pull on your lashes otherwise..-Donu2019t worry; those tiny mascara tubes you see in your hand, cotton round, or shower are not your lashesu2014thatu2019s the beauty of tubing technology.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the worst mascara Iu2019ve ever used. Did absolutely nothing for me, honestly like seemed the product was dried out as there wasnu2019t much coming onto the wand. Couldnu2019t even return as I used my rouge reward to purchase. Get the Tartelette XL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have Asian eyes, you know that our lashes are so hard to keep curls and smudges easily. This is how my eyes look after more than eight hours of wear plus light rain in Washington. The curls arenu2019t the best near the inner corner of my eyes but I have pretty short lashes and lack skills to curl them so itu2019s not the mascarau2019s fault. But as you can see, no smudges underneath or on top of the eyes. The only mascara not made in Asia that I found that works!
Product dried up and impossible to apply, would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even though this is a tubing mascara, it's very hard to remove in comparison to the Tarte one and doesnt provide 'Lash Extension' type length for me. I would recommend other tubing mascaras like the Tartelette XL one instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t listen to these people. I have super sensitive eyes and small lashes and this makes me look absolutely fabulous. Love the length and I can even sleep in it without it hurting recommend that to everyone)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t have any flaking, like other reviewers mentioned. I have tried other blinc mascaras and while I love the tubing formula, they were too clumpy for me. This one does not clump thanks to the wand, and instead it separates the lashes well. Will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My fav mascara. I love the wand, it separates my lashes perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can understand why some would not like this mascara. However for me personally itu2019s amazing. I have long fine stick straight lashes I would always get way too much product on them. Not with this mascara easy to use easy to remove . I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes but it was too wet and weighed my lashes down. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loooooove this mascara. I have an oily eye area so with normal mascara I usually look like a racoon by the end of the day, but with this mascara, my lashes look long and defined all day long, as long as I'm not touching my eyes, which you shouldn't be doing anyway.  Taking it off at the end of the day is so easy because I can just do it in the shower or while I'm washing my face, with almost no effort and no mess. Love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So weird this has low scores- this lengthens, separates and holds for days actually. This is the kind of tubing mascara you can wear for almost 3 days and just touch it up if you want to. Goes on like a breeze, comes off like a breeze.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not sure where the bad reviews are coming from..I absolutely LOVE this mascara! I get soo many compliments on how fabulous my lashes look! This mascara does not smudge and super easy to take off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVVEEEE!!! this product is amazing and it holds the whole day!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m honestly surprised at the poor ratings- I absolutely love this mascara and this week while wearing it, someone asked if I was wearing false lashes! Iu2019m a general fan of tubing mascaras and this one has moved to the top of my list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is very DRY. It appeared to have good lasting power, but required several coats (that ended up flaky looking) because of the dry formula. I returned it and went back to Milani.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed in this mascara. Been using it almost a year now and it usually gets dry and flakey towards the end but this new tube I got is so dry and flaky right when I opened it barely any product. product in the tube. I wonu2019t be ordering more will try a new brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love some of the other Blinc mascaras, particularly the amplifying product, but this was a huge miss for me. So dry and the end result not worth the effort of getting enough product out of the tube. I tossed it after a few uses.
Very very dry formula, had it for no more than a month and it is so dry it doesnu2019t even look like it has anything on the brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the brown mascara, it makes my eyelashes look super spidery even if I comb them out. Very flaky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My lashes look better just curling them. The flakes are crazy on this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially I really liked this mascara. Easily buildable without clumping and washes off really easily with just water. But, it flakes. Sometimes tiny flakes that give you the raccoon look, other times large u2018extensionu2019 flakes. Im always looking for my fav mascara - looks like Im still on the hunt

reviews.review_title: Love the mascara, if its ever coming back in stock
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. it stays in place, doesn't flake, doesn't clump. I love tubing mascaras that wash away with just water, and everyone kept recommending Tarte Tartelette which isn't a true tubing mascara and smudged everywhere. But the three stars is because this hasn't been in stock since at least September. I reached out to customer service asking if it was discontinued, and they said no, but clearly they aren't stocking anymore. Annoying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite mascara! This is seriously the only one that doesnu2019t rub off and give me raccoon eyes yet comes off easily at night with makeup remover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Flake city! I needed a new mascara and the store associate recommended this product to me, now listen, I donu2019t usually go off of recommendations from others when it comes to mascara, so I was sort of skeptical when trying this and my skepticism was CORRECT! This mascara was SO DRY as soon as I got it out the box and it was SO FLAKY when applying it, the WORST mascara Iu2019ve ever purchased in my life. The formula is horrendous & I literally canu2019t believe this mascara is on the market and itu2019s not cheap either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is, hands down, my favorite tubing mascara, and Iu2019ve tried (and continue to try) them all.  Doesnu2019t clump or over-volumize, stays all day without irritating my overly sensitive eyes, and removes easil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many tubing mascaras as I love that they donu2019t smudge.  Blinc is far and away the best, and particularly this formula.  It doesnu2019t clump or flake and comes off easily with  water.  It is excellent for sensitive eyes as it is non irritating as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so badly. And at first I did. I canu2019t wear regular mascara without looking like a raccoon. So I am always on the hunt for a good         tubing mascara since Thrive seems to be the only one  one around  one around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed. After about 2-3 weeks it started to dry out and became flaky upon application and then fell off my lashes during the day. Not used to this from Blinc.

reviews.review_title: Blinc should address the quick dry out issue
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this mascara when it's not dried out. It seems to dry out in the tube much faster than other mascaras. I try to be really good about closing it tightly as well. the last couple I had dried out faster than my first time purchase. if they could get better control of that, absolutely 5 stars. it performs beautifully when it is a fresh bottle. looks natural, doesn't flake or transfer.

I did like this product but there is not much in tube. Just bought it end of July and already empty. I wouldnu2019t mind but I donu2019t wear mascara every day. I wear only when I go out which is not  often as I babysit grandkids mostly.

reviews.review_title: Love the formula but the wand is weak
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this mascara for years but new packaging is weak and makes the wand start bending all over the place right at the brush after a while when you try to put it back in the tube and it is impossible to get it in without breaking the thing. The brush is too flexible and bends everywhere instead of being rigid enough to be able to push it straight in the tube. The mascara isnu2019t hard to remove like waterproof but does not budge until you want it to even holds up in light rain/sweat/tears without running unless tou start rubbing. I have pretty hooded eyelids and everything smears on me. I stopped wearing makeup for a lot of covid and recently went back to this brand after being annoyed at always looking like a racoon with other kinds but cant buy again with this packaging issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the product because it works well with me wearing contact lenses. Some products shed bits of mascara throughout the day. This one does not. Also it has good lash building. I give it 3 stars because the product does not last long before you have to replace it.

reviews.review_title: Terrible quality -- looks awful. Do not purchase.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Clumpy and dry. This used to be a personal favourite, but the past two tubes I have bought have been dry and clumped on my eyelashes. This does not coat the lash at all. It looks terrible. I end up having to try to paint it on with a different applicator brush, and then comb off excess globs with a lash comb. TERRIBLE. Will never buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is incredible. So good if you go for a minimal/natural makeup look. It never flakes on me, and I love that itu2019s not all gloopy and wet like some mascaras. Easy to apply, dries fast, holds my curl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used to love this product but last few purchases have not been good.  Had to return one as it was dried up and the replacement was also dry and hard to use.  So disappointing.  I wonu2019t purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i liked this- it stays on really well which is helpful cuz i work on a ranch in the summers and it gets rlly hot and sweaty. the only thing is the quality of it isnt the best.. it was good but not what i expect for the price, it clumped a hit and the wand wasnt great,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara works fantastic for swimming, however for a daily mascara the tubing action means you have to use friction to remove it which causes a lot of eyelash loss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only mascara I've ever used that doesn't smudge beneath my eyes halfway through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received my first tube and it was very dry and difficult to apply. I contacted Sephora and they sent a second tube immediately. Unfortunately, the second tube was no different. I donu2019t like the mascara. I thought it might be a good replacement for my Thrive but it doesnu2019t even come close. Sephorau2b50ufe0fu2b50ufe0fu2b50ufe0fu2b50ufe0fu2b50ufe0f Blincu2014

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of tubing mascara. This has been a longtime favourite. I like how easily and gently it comes off. The product can dry up so make sure to keep the top clean. I think this product works just as well as non tubing mascaras at adding length and volume, but without the mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worked great for a month. Then it completely dried out. For something at this price point I'd expect it to at least last the regular 3 months a mascara should! Super disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Skip it.  Not worth the $$ at all.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product does nothing but make your eyelashes black.  It does not extend, and it definitely does not hold a curl. Less than a minute after curling and applying my lashes fell and were stick straight again.  Really disappointed with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! It never smudges. just be careful not to rub your eyes if you are getting teary eyed, some tubes might end up on your cheek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t see the hype in all honestly they say all the celebs use this but I like the caliray mascara way more

reviews.review_title: Flakes everywhere and doesnu2019t stay on!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Flakes off all under my eyes and I donu2019t have any mascara off by the end of the day. Also flakes when i put it on and is all under my eyes and on my cheeks. It was great the first few applications but I am returning mine because it doesnu2019t stay on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The wand is so cheap that it wasnu2019t strong enough to push back into the container and it broke after a month. Who cares if the mascara is great if you canu2019t close itu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this mascara. My eyes are really sensitive with a lot of different mascaras, but this works perfectly for me. Stays on through a whole work day, and no fallout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first fell I love with the original Blinc mascara for years, then the formula changed. I switched to Kevyn Aucoin for a while but received one that was dried out. In not having time to re-order another before a trip I tried Blinc again, this time the Amplified version and I swear it works better than the original before the formula changed! Adds length and volume, and of course is great for my hooded eyes. I can understand itu2019s maybe a little more difficult to remove but using hot water and letting it sit on the lashes for a 10-20 seconds before attempting to remove really helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the formula of the mascara, but the applicator is too sparse. I look like I have 6 eyelashes total the way it clumps my lashes together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this out after using Hourglass and DHC tubing mascaras, hoping to find something that would stand up to some more lifestyle hazards, but still needing a tubing mascara as my eyes are always so sensitive to removing mascara. Well, it definitely does that. Blinc is very hearty and never came off accidentally. But it also is so much harder to remove than other tubing mascaras that, for me, it is only slightly better than breaking out a traditional waterproof. I will probably keep this around for when I know I need to plan for stay-put mascara that day, but I do plan to switch back to Hourglass for daily use as my eyes just can't take the scrubbing it took to remove this one on a regular basis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was dried up when I got it. nothing was even on the wand when I took it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara used to be my favorite but the formula has changed.  It used to stay on my lashes all day and night.  Now it flakes off after just a couple hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara I have ever used it makes my lashes look long and full 100% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have hooded eyes and struggle with my mascara wiping off under my eyelids. this is the first mascara i havenu2019t had that issue with! i also love how easily it washes off with water. iu2019ve already purchased my second tube!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes but sadly did not work for me at all. Went back to my regular mascara.

reviews.review_title: Doesnu2019t Extend Lashes & Flakes Off Quickly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara because I was running low on a tubing mascara from a different brand that was too expensive to re-purchase. This Blinc mascara is really disappointing. It doesnu2019t extend the appearance of my lashes, and it starts flaking onto my face very quickly. I will return it.
I had high hopes for this mascara and it definitely delivers! Makes my natural lashes look amazing and so simple to take it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite mascarau2026love it ! What a differenceu2026u2026u2026u2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, it applies nicely without clumping and wears well. It also washes off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this mascara. Reminds me of Thrive cosmetics mascara. Yes it can flake (if you rub your eyes or pick at it) but why would you do that if you have make up on? I use primer before I put this on, and it works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not recommend!  The fibres don't come off easily with water and pressure- it creates a mess.  I also found that small pieces were coming off throughout the day and getting in my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara holds a curl, it gives length, volume, and it doesnu2019t budge at all. I used to use Thriveu2019s mascara but I just couldnu2019t deal with their excessively long shipping times, so someone recommended this, and I recommend it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a woman with long lashes and deep set eyes this is a life saver. Pretty much every other mascara hits the top of my eye sockets and smudges all over. With this I don't have to worry.   I used the original years ago but it doesnt give enough volume so I used it as a topper ontop of other mascaras.   This version is very thick and full which I love. I can use it on its own or a topper as a fixer.

reviews.review_title: Don't understand all the hyped and not worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased on Sept.16th 2022 and it was a disappointment. It came recommended by the sale associate at Sephora. It was good when first put on but you has to use multiple coatings to get it to show on lashes however once dried, it started to flake like crazy and mascara seem to turn to dust. Where did they get the humidity proof, life proof or sweat proof from? I wore it to gym and mascara smudged especially bottom lash came off by itself, and it did not hold a curl at all outside doing normal errands. Brush is better but it still clumps and a lot still comes on the wand brush. After a week, I returned it ( 9-22-22), not worth the price or hassle. Misleading ads

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: looks great if you can keep it clean. it's very messy. only used it a couple times so far but it's messy putting it on and the tube and wand also gets messy due to too much coming out when removing wand. easy to remove though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this mascara. Separates and lengthens. No clumping and used it on vacation in Georgia where the heat and humidity were brutal and no smudging or raccoon eyes. I found it to be long lasting but easy to remove and I was very impressed. Buying more for backup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive never experienced an allergic reaction from any mascara before in my life. I am writing this with puffy eyelids, congestion and just sneezed a million times. I am miserable. Not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It started great but after a week of use it is starting to flake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Works great and lasts all day and washes off nicely. The only downfall is that the wand and tube are so messy!! When I close it the mascara squishes out and gets all over my makeup bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually wear waterproof mascara because nothing else holds a curl all day for me. Iu2019ve tried quite a few that promise the ability to do so despite not being waterproof and nothing has impressed me. This has become the next best option! It doesnu2019t hold a curl as strong as waterproof mascaras but itu2019s very close too, and frankly the ease of removal plus having pretty dry eyes already makes this fit the bill for me.   Does give beautiful length and some decent volume too. But it can get a little chunky if you try to put too many layers on with too much time in between. Slight drying between layers gives the tubes a chance to form so itu2019s better to move a bit faster.   TL;DR I would recommend for an alternative to waterproof mascara, curl and longevity wise if removal is an issue for you. Good length and volume too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Separates lashes and coats nicely. Able to use a couple coats before it starts breaking off. Unfortunately when my eyes were watery the mascara came right off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use to use Thrive but hated that I had to pay for shipping and couldnu2019t just pick it up. I will say I love this mascara as itu2019s almost as good! It doesnu2019t thicken my lashes as much but it definitely tubing and extends! It saves me having to order multiples and I get the Sephora rouge credit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If all you want is a mascara that doesnu2019t transfer, smear, or runu2026this is king. If I want to step up my game just a tad and wear the most minimal makeup I grab this mascara, the Patrick Ta clear eyebrow gel, the fenty eye bright concealer and I look like I actually tried

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for oily lids! I have really oily lids and every mascara smudges on the skin below my eyes no matter what I use. Even with primer, regular mascara topped with waterproof it smudges. I asked the Sephora beauty advisor for her recs. Low and behold I tried this tubing mascara and Iu2019m floored. Iu2019ve worn it all day. Not a smudge under my eye. I even went to the gym with no smudges. I canu2019t believe itu2019s taken me this long to discover this tubing mascara. Now I can reduce buyinh primer and waterproof mascara every month. I highly recommend if your mascara runs on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the hype! Initially it looked good but after the mascara dried it started to come off like a powder when you touch your eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried all the Blinc mascaras and preeeetty much every high end mascara you can think of. This is by far the best tubing mascara Iu2019ve tried and is genuinely the first time Iu2019ve found a u2018holy grailu2019 product (or even bothered to review something.) I have hooded eyes and oily lids, and stubby sad eyelashes. This holds a curl and defines! Itu2019s not for major drama, but itu2019s pretty great. FYI I prefer a drier formula, which this definitely is. But I donu2019t have to unclump my eyelashes w this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love, Love Love! Better than Trish McEvoy and Thrive. Lengthens, holds curl, adds volume with zero clumps. Doesnu2019t flake off and get into eyes like many tubing mascaras sometimes do. Doesnu2019t transfer under my eyes even when hot and humid. Washes off easily. I apply two coats without waiting in between, I find this works best for me because itu2019s not a wet formula, so it doesnu2019t weigh your lashes down.  This is my favorite mascara at the moment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clumps like crazy, maybe the wiper was busted but there was always too much product on the brush. Very difficult to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like Iu2019ve tried every single mascarau2014from drugstore to high endu2014and never found one I really liked until now. I have naturally long lashes and all the mascaras that made them look better would flake or smudge, or they were virtually impossible to take off at night. This mascara lengthens and adds volume to my lashes without smudging throughout the day, yet comes off super easily with makeup remover! I have found my holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara. Very easy to remove yet stays on all day long. My only complaint is that the wand starts to goop up quickly after a few uses. Thatu2019s the only reason for deducting the one star.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SO GOOD. Way less clumpy/ cakey than other Blinc mascaras, and it still looked great at the end of the day. Easy to remove as well. 10/10!!
